question: You live in a room in college which you share with another student.However, there are many problems with this arrangement and you find itvery difficult to work.Write a letter to the accommodation officer at the college. In your letterdescribe the situationexplain your problems and why it is difficult to worksay what kind of accommodation you would preferYou do NOT need to write any addresses.Begin your letter as follows:Dear Sir or Madam,
text: This is Mee Mee , a third-year history student who is currently living in the Padauk dormitory . Indeed , I am writing this letter to reveal the inconvenience that I have encountered while I am sharing the room with my roommate.

To begin with , being a social butterfly , her friends come and visit her every weekend.In addition , more often than not , they throw a party and play the music very loudly . What makes the matter worse is that  they do not go back and sleep in this small room altogether. My place is not spick and span anymore and filled up with their food waste.

Normally , I am not the kind of person who pesters my problems . However , I can not tolerate this situation anymore as my exam is nearer and I am trying to pass it with flying colours. Due to their noise , I could not get a decent sleep almost every night , so , it literally affects my concentration level.
It would be very nice if you arrange  a single room for the rest of my stay . I am completely comfortable whether the area is big or not.My point is that I do not want to get any distractions.
Looking forward to your kind arrangement.
